segments.text: Why am I being charged $ 10 for a movie that I never ordered ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , according to your file , you spent Monday evening watching ' Titanic . '
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the file is wrong . I was at a great concert that night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , this wouldn't be the first time that a file was wrong . Just a moment , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for taking care of it so quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , when I deleted the $ 10 , the program automatically added a $ 2 service charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can't do that ! You can't charge me for a mistake that you made !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes you can't win for losing , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , now I've seen it all ! What a rip-off this place is !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't blame you , sir . Two dollars is a lot of money .
segments.speaker: S2
